title: Third Post is here. No more fun.
content: The third post is up now. Things aren't fun anymore. Now everything is business. Serious business.

title: Already on the Second Post!!
content: My second post feels like it's coming way too soon! Maybe I should rename these to threads or something? It just feels like wayyy to much!

title: First Post!
content: This is my very first blog post! It's really just here for testing purposes, but we can at least pretend it's special, right?
